casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David AHMADI-TURSHIZI. No. 92P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 23, 2006. Anthony M. Brannon, Raleigh, for David Ahmadi-Turshizi. *615C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of February 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of February 2006."
